##Notice Information##
* Tender Status: Expired
* Tender Description:
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites tenders for the provision of refuse and recycling services, including the rental of containers and pickup and disposal of refuse and recyclable materials, on a regular schedule and as and when requested, for the RCMP Academy-Depot Division located in Regina, Saskatchewan.
The contract period will be seven (7) years, with irrevocable options to extend it for up to three (3) additional one-year periods. Security clearances are required for personnel working on site. Basis of selection: lowest price.
Tenders must be submitted electronically to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit at: NWR_Procurement_Bids@rcmp-grc.gc.ca.
Refer to the attached tender documents for further information.

##Trade Agreements and Indigenous Procurement##
The contract is governed by the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and other relevant trade agreements. The RCMP also encourages participation from Indigenous businesses. To access the Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) and learn more about accessing government contracts reserved for Indigenous businesses, please visit [www.canada.ca/indigenousbusinessdirectory](http://www.canada.ca/indigenousbusinessdirectory).
